revised_title: The Relationship Between Ungual Corium and Periosteum of the Ungual Phalanx
tldr: This article discusses the connection between the ungual corium and the periosteum of the ungual phalanx in the human body. It also explores the role of sunlight in killing bacteria, specifically anthrax spores, and its potential as a natural disinfectant for air and water.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Histology
